reviewText: Excellent all the way around. I would buy from them again. Very satisfied overall.

If you are a fan of Mr. Freeman's work, then you will gladly be taught the meaning of our populated world with the atmospheric cultures, system of the outer world around us, the meaning of what science vs life amongst human beings is compared.

WOW, this series is one that I have never seen before, but now that I have watched this I can say that I now want to see the other seasons! This series will make you think deeply and see the cosmos in a whole new way. The series brings up many concepts and ideas that I would have not thought of, and if you are like me, always looking for something to push you further, this series will do just that! This is a well done series that will open your eyes and your mind!

*I received this for review - all opinions are my own*

Season 4 continues the greatness of Morgan Freeman loaded with information from numerous theoretical physicists, neurobiologist's, engineers etc. I highly recommend all seasons of this series, especially if Carl Sagan and Neil deGrasse Tyson's 'Cosmos' was just not enough.
a great new addition to my viewing collaboration
I've always enjoyed Morgan Freeman and have enjoyed this interesting series. Arrived on time and in new condition
Great Seller! Great Prices Highly Recommended!

A fantastic show rooted in science and factual evidence. The best parts of this show are how Morgan Freeman hosts each episode and the variety of topics that actual scientific researchers are currently exploring. It really opens your mind to a number of interesting topics that science, philosophy, and other disciplines are currently working on understanding.
Fabulous
Love it!
Good show on dvd,Thanks
A great series which answers many provocative questions.

It made me angry that in spite of repeatedly asking "When is this coming out in Bluray?" Neither the Discovery Channel OR Amazon would answer my question- and I started this since October, 2014.  Finally in anguish and disgust- since I own seasons 1-3 on Bluray- I reluctantly ordered the DVD version only to discover that the quality was of Bluray.

Good going, Discovery and Amazon.  Both of you have NO idea of your own production capability.
An excellent and thought-provoking series presented clearly for the average (lay) viewer.

This is very informative. I have to watch the episodes several times to get all of the information out of them. If you want to keep up with the fringe of science, this is the series to watch.

Freeman explores all kinds of imponderable questions, such as "Is there a god particle?" "How do aliens think?" "Will sex become extinct?" and "Is reality real?" (NO kidding!). It's a surreal trip though cosmology.

a wonderful continuation of a mind blowing series that delves into questions that are outside the box and some of the possible answers are such that they make you beg for more....Morgan Freeman is outstanding in his presentation and i wish this series would never end
haven't watch this season yet so can not comment. but the other previous seasons are good so I can only imagine it will be fine.
Bought season 1-4 as gifts for Christmas.
Simply great

If you are at that stage of spiritual/intellectual development where you have begun to really think critically, wondering if Descartes was right, wondering how deep the rabbit hole goes, and are not easily upset by having conventional modes of believing disrupted, then these shows are a great first stepping stone for you. Please bear in mind as you are watching, however, that the History Channel is part of the mainstream media (this fact carries with it many implications and things to consider). If you are creative in your process, and really investigate each lead presented in Through the Wormhole in as many ways and from as many angles as possible (you will have to dig a little and risk public ridicule), then your path to wherever you are bound awaits...
Great gift for a science minded older grandchild.
Love these shows!  Actual legitimate scientists exploring fascinating, and sometimes mind-blowing, questions.
